I haven't heard of this publication.  Can you tell us more about it?  Is 
there an index to it?

I would love to know if there are any articles on the Satsuma Rebellion of 
1877.

Bob Burke

In a message dated 8/26/03 7:23:47 AM, mickey.letham@... writes:

<< There are two very good articles in the latest issues of Monumenta

Nipponica, numbers 58.1 and 58.2. This is the start of a series of articles

commemorating the 300 anniversary of the event. >>
